column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Diy_coref|
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Diy_coref_re|BT_webanno.custom.Diy_coref

#Text=[0176] Alternatively a gain, G, can be incorporated in the differentiation process such that the rate of change of inertia, pJ.sub.d, is approximated as follows: 21 pJ d pJ d 1 + pJ d / G ( 25 )
#Text=[0177] At low frequencies the approximation given by Equation 25 is accurate, whereas at high frequencies the gain is limited to G.
#Text=G is typically in the range 3 to 20.
#Text=Equation 25 can be discretised for digital implementation by any of the standard methods such as the Tustin Transformation.
#Text=[0178] Another method of addressing the issue of a noisy estimate derivative is to effectively re-sample the inertia estimate at a lower rate before differentiation takes place.

#Text=Because the inertia changes gradually over the course of a spin cycle, it is not necessary to calculate its derivative at the relatively high rates of sampling that are required by the estimator to get an accurate estimate of inertia J.sub.d.

#Text=For example, if the inertia is estimated at a rate of 1 ms, it may only be necessary to consider every 1000.sup.th inertia estimate when calculating p(J.sub.d), which is effectively the same as resampling the data at 1 s.
#Text=Moreover, this method could be used in conjunction with filtering.
#Text=[0179] In other embodiments, the spin cycle end is detected by using the raw inertia estimate only.

#Text=Prior to the spin cycle being detected, an estimate of drum inertia and an approximate calculation of the unbalance radius is obtained as part of the unbalance detection process at around 100 rpm.

#Text=Using a representative figure for the reduction in mass of the laundry, which can be obtained by experiment and stored in the memory 108, it is possible to calculate what the inertia should be at the end of the spin cycle.
#Text=This value is then used as a "target" value for determining the completion of the spin cycle.
#Text=When the inertia drops below the projected value and stays within specified limits for a specified period of time, the spin cycle is deemed to have completed.

#Text=[0180] The particular embodiments disclosed above are illustrative only, as the invention may be modified and practiced in different but equivalent manners apparent to those skilled in the art having the benefit of the teachings herein.
#Text=Furthermore, no limitations are intended to the details of construction or design herein shown, other than as described in the claims below.
#Text=It is therefore evident that the particular embodiments disclosed above may be altered or modified and all such variations are considered within the scope and spirit of the invention.
#Text=Accordingly, the protection sought herein is as set forth in the claims below.
